QuestDescription.SourceString: The Wise Old Man wants to teach you about Lifewards and how to recharge them.
QuestDescription.LocalizedString: The Wise Old Man wants to teach you about Lifewards and how to recharge them.

Value.SourceString: Speak to the Wise Old Man to learn about Lifewards.
Value.LocalizedString: Speak to the Wise Old Man to learn about Lifewards.

Value.SourceString: Craft a Small Wardstone at a Rune Altar and bring it to the Wise Old Man.
Value.LocalizedString: Craft a Small Wardstone at a Rune Altar and bring it to the Wise Old Man.

Value.SourceString: Bring your Small Wardstone to the Wise Old Man.
Value.LocalizedString: Bring your Small Wardstone to the Wise Old Man.
